trans-unit.source: Returns the current Date and Time in PC's format

seg-source.mrk: Returns the current Date and Time in PC's format

target.mrk: Returns the current Date and Time in PC's format

trans-unit.source: Returns Current Date and Time in PC's format.

seg-source.mrk: Returns Current Date and Time in PC's format.

target.mrk: Returns Current Date and Time in PC's format.

trans-unit.source: If Date format isn't found in the registry it returns the date in the mm/dd/yyyy format.

seg-source.mrk: If Date format isn't found in the registry it returns the date in the mm/dd/yyyy format.

target.mrk: If Date format isn't found in the registry it returns the date in the mm/dd/yyyy format.

trans-unit.source: If Time format isn't found in the registry it returns the time in the hh:mm:ss format.

seg-source.mrk: If Time format isn't found in the registry it returns the time in the hh:mm:ss format.

target.mrk: If Time format isn't found in the registry it returns the time in the hh:mm:ss format.
